label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_016
content:
## 2024-09-17 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total Flows: 14939388
- Unique Source IPs: 1933
- Unique Destination IPs: 3945
- Average Flow Duration (sec): 35.3
- Top Protocol TCP Percentage: 85.5
- Top Protocol UDP Percentage: 10.6
- ICMP Percentage: 1.1
- Long Lived Flows Greater Than 1 Hour: 64
- East-West Traffic Percentage: 56.6

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total Queries: 3618359
- Unique Domains: 78256
- NXDOMAIN Responses: 9382
- DGA Suspected Domains: 3
- DNS Over HTTPS Queries: 1110
- Average Response Time (ms): 5.9
- Cache Hit Percentage: 91.4
- TXT Record Queries: 642
- PTR Queries: 11096

### Ids Ips Hits
- Total Alerts: 478
- Blocked by IPS: 175
- Signature Matches: 325
- Anomaly Detections: 36
- Severity Critical: 2
- Severity High: 7
- Severity Medium: 64
- Severity Low: 245
- Top Signatures: 
  - ET WEB SERVER SQL Injection Attempt
  - ET MALWARE CnC Beacon Activity
  - ET SCAN SSH Brute Force Attempt
- False Positive Rate Percentage: 15.0

### Bandwidth Utilization
- WAN In (Gbps Average): 4.17
- WAN Out (Gbps Average): 1.78

- Top Talker Bytes (GB): 32.0

- TLS 1.2 Connections: 59891
- TLS 1.3 Connections: 124740
- Weak Cipher Usage: 3

  - Memory Percentage: 41
  - Cache Size (GB): 2.3

### Events
- IDS signature ET SCAN tuned: updated to latest ruleset
- BGP route change: AS path prepend from ISP-A — investigated

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-17. 14939388 flows analyzed. 3618359 DNS queries. 478 IDS alerts (2 critical, 7 high). WAN avg 4.17/1.78 Gbps in/out. 1 BGP announcements.
